ticket.title: [PATCH] action_view/safe_buffer is no longer valid
ticket.original-body:
santiago@debian:~/Documentos/WyeWorks/Proys/rails/railties/test$ ruby application/configuration_test.rb 
Loaded suite application/configuration_test
Started
.......E........
Finished in 25.197241 seconds.

  1) Error:
test_frameworks_are_preloaded_with_config.preload_frameworks_is_set(ApplicationTests::ConfigurationTest):
ActiveSupport::Testing::RemoteError: caught LoadError: no such file to load -- action_view/safe_buffer
